Text: Really pixelated....looks like it is upconvert from dvd to 1080p...i have the 3d version and if i turn it to 2D it is better...big waste of time downloading if you are looking for crisp 1080p...
^^Your either blind or stupid, and if you already have a 1080p copy why are you downloading mine?  And it looks like no one else has anything to complain about.
